buyer.no_share: The seller has yet to share this listing to me. Please message them directly.
buyer.no_queue: The seller has not yet set up a queue for this item.
buyer.success_add_queue: Great! You've been added to the queue.
buyer.no_faq: The seller has not yet set up a FAQ. Please contact the seller directly.
buyer.not_in_queue: You are not presently in the queue.
buyer.remove_queue: You have successfully been removed from the queue.

chat.buyer_warning: You haven't replied in 24 hours! Reply within the next 24 hours to keep your position in line.
chat.buyer_danger: It's been 48 hours since the seller messaged you! Unfortunately, this means you will get kicked out of the queue.
chat.seller_warning: You haven't replied in 24 hours! Be sure to reply soon!
chat.seller_danger: It's been 48 hours since the buyer messaged you! Be sure to reply soon!

faq.question: Would you like to setup a FAQ?
faq.finish: Thanks! A FAQ has been set up.
faq.no_faq: You can set up a faq any time in the future by sharing the post again.

general.next: What would you like to do next?

queue.did_add: A queue has been set up! What would you like to do next?
queue.did_not_add: You can set up a queue any time in the future by sharing the post again.
queue.question: Would you like to set up a queue for this item?
queue.buyer_question: Would you like to be added to the queue?

seller.own_listing: This is one of your listings!
seller.remove_listing: This item was successfully removed from your listings. What would you like to do next?

start.show_interested: Show all items you're interested in

user_categorization.question: Are you the seller of this item?
